description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.Item 1.",
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal: Valve Items Procurement

## Background

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the procurement of valve items. The following items are required:

### Description of Items

| Item Number | Valve Type | Description | Quantity | Unit of Issue | End Destination |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Fluid Valve Trim | STEM, Valves, Nonpowered | 8 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 2 | Fluid Valve Trim | STEM, Valves, Nonpowered | 6 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 3 | Valve Seat | SEAT, Valves, Nonpowered | 8 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 4 | Valve Seat | SEAT, Valves, Nonpowered | 6 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| 5 | Valves | GUIDE, Valve Stem, Nonpowered | 4 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| 6 | Valves | GUIDE, Valve Stem, Nonpowered | 3 | EA | CFB Halifax |

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Method:** Competitve Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:**
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Languages of Submission:**
	+ English
	+ French
* **Currency:** Canadian Dollars
* **Submission Deadline:** Closed (Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-18T14:00:00)
* **Services of DND VO Contracting Authority (Forms required):** None

## Tender Requirements

* Proposals must include a clear description of the proposed goods and services
* Proposals must include prices in Canadian dollars
* Proposals must indicate the brand name, model, and/or part number of the goods and services proposed
* Proposals may be submitted in either English or French
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement

## Interested Parties

To request further information on this procurement, please contact:

Jean-Pierre Normandin
Procurement Specialist
Directorate Maritime Procurement
101 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
Phone: 819-939-3674
Email: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
